users.name: National Library
users.desc: National Library, the former residence of Governor-General during the British period, is well-known for rich treasures of rare and significant books and publications; and eerie stories knitted on it

users.name: The Royal Calcutta Turf Club
users.desc: Long ago, there lived George Williams, a complete race freak. His passion, desire and dreams of winning the bet revolved around a snow-white horse named Pride, who was the champion of all tracks

users.name: Bhoot Bangla
users.desc: William Hastings, once a Governor-General of Bengal, built this ancient building as his residence. Called as Belvedere Estate, this haunted house in Kolkata is presently the location for an undergraduate womenâ€™s college under the University of Calcutta.
